biotools.summary: Transformato is a package that helps to set up relative alchemical free energy calculations of small molecules with a common core scaffold, either for solvation free energy1 or binding free energy2 estimates. The package is designed to be used with output generated by CHARMM-GUI.

bioschemas.name: transformato
bioschemas.summary: Transformato is a package that helps to set up relative alchemical free energy calculations of small molecules with a common core scaffold, either for solvation free energy1 or binding free energy2 estimates. The package is designed to be used with output generated by CHARMM-GUI.
